entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [LSP] Unify Razor/Roslyn LCS implementations #57245
  • Formatting of list-patterns on multiple lines is incorrect #57244
  • [LSP] Always create lsp misc files and resolve rps regression #57243
  • Allow for a way to ensure some source generators run before / after others #57239
  • Flaky integration tests with 17.0p5 #57237
  • Provide a shortcut for navigation to base types #57236
  • KeyNotFoundException from FindReferencesSearchEngine.ProcessDocumentAsync #57235
  • Remove apphost from `csi` for source-build to avoid prebuilt dependency on a 3.1 apphost pack #57233
  • Renaming file(with type) freezes UI #57232
  • Pulling member up does not copy documentation #57230
  • Add a "add breakpoint" in the context menu when clicking on a margin of an overridden member #57229
  • Emit tests are approaching the string limit #57226

Closed

  • Disallow null-suppression operator `!` applies to value type contexts #57142
    17.1
  • Semantic clarification & document highlight gold bar #57246
  • How to target specific framework/core versions when building with CSharpCompilation #57075
  • Suggestion for unnamed symbols completion: Offer completion for await #52289
    Backlog
  • Nullability mismatch from a switch expression cannot be suppressed directly and must be suppressed on every arm #52143
    17.1.P1
  • [ArPow] Incorporate source-build ArPow patches #55553
    17.1
  • Convert to file-scoped namespace refactoring isn't applicable at all levels #57198
  • VisualStudioActiveDocumentTracker doesn't handle all element IDs #57203
    17.1
  • clicking on a specific error (CS5001) fails to reach the on-line search - #56318
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #57240
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Add Emit2 test project #57238
    Area-Compilers
  • handle null project paths in solution #57234
    Area-IDE
  • [LSP] Add semantic tokens benchmarks + improve edit algorithm #57231
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Add ServiceHub core host integration test CI #57228
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #57225
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57242
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to main #57095
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #57241
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Ensure new files are formatted based on the right language version #57119
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove unnecessary Symbol type checks #57181
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Completion: Suggest "await" after dot of awaitable expression #55817
    Area-IDE, Feature Request, Community, Next
  • Update Language Feature Status.md #57227
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57224
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #57215
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Honor suppression on switch expression #57204
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Pattern Matching, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, 17.1.P1
  • Async lightbulb performance improvement for compiler analyzer execution #56844
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, Next
  • Apply arcade-powered source-build patches #55823
    Area-Infrastructure, Source-Build, Next
  • Fix VisualStudioActiveDocumentTracker to handle VSSELELEMID.SEID_Wind… #57206
    Area-IDE, Next
  • List patterns: Use the base node to share code #57207
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns

Updated

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57248
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Implement 'Enable nullable reference types' refactoring #57200
    Area-IDE, Feature Request, 17.1.P1
  • Interpolated string handler IOperation support #56276
    Area-Analyzers
  • List patterns: main IDE scenarios and AddRequiredParens #53850
    Area-IDE, New Feature - List Patterns, 17.1
  • Incremental Generator Work Tracking API Implementation #55469
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.1
  • Implement an LspWorkspaceManager and modify how we fork documents in LSP. #57140
    Area-IDE
  • Move skeleton ref caching to ProjectStates #57158
    Area-IDE
  • Fix for "Function pointer invocation has "None" IOperation" #57191
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Adding some additional tests and asserts #57164
    Area-IDE
  • Options refactoring #57139
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • Compute val escape for extended property patterns #57211
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Extended Property Patterns
  • Allow newlines in the holes inside interpolated strings #56853
    Area-Compilers, Compiler.Next
  • List patterns: IOperation #56008
    Area-Compilers
  • [hackathon] Support for ValueArray in C# escape analysis. #57218
    Area-Compilers
  • List patterns: counterexample for non-exhaustive switch expressions #55327
    Area-Compilers
  • Avoid emitting synthesized delegate types for delegates that are not referenced #56747
    Area-Compilers
  • Check constraints on lifted operator types #57050
    Area-Compilers
  • Codefix for CS1591: Add ///<inheritdoc/> #57004
    Area-IDE, Community
  • BackgroundAnalysisScope enhancements (Part 1) #57172
    Area-Analyzers, Needs UX Triage
  • features/list-patterns #54864
    PR For Personal Review Only
  • Go To Definition from source information in PDBs #57073
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required
  • Fix ServiceHub Core host option #57223
    Area-Infrastructure, 17.0
  • Always set BuildingInsideVisualStudio when loading MSBuild workspace #57219
    Area-IDE
